name: MUTATE (post Jam)
description:
Entry for the GMTK Deadline Missers Jam. -  Technical problems fixed 

  • DESCRIPTION

Play as the Abomination, the result of strange scientific experiments. A random mutation makes you switch between 4 distinct creatures with different abilities.  Some enemies are only v.,ulnerable to a specific creature. 

How long can you survive the swarming waves of enemies ?

  • CREATURES : 

- T ( purple ) : Melee attack, circular area of effect.

- D ( green ) : No actions whatsoever, run for your life. 

- L ( yellow ) : cannot move, but immune to damage while dashing.

- P ( red ) : shoots projectiles. 

  • CONTROLS : 

WASD - Move around. 

Mouse : Aim

Left Click : Action.
